# pure-menu



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                                  | Type             | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------- | ----------- |
| `as`              | `as`               | Display different HTML element or component as table wrapper | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `heading`         | `heading`          | Display a heading                                            | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `headingPosition` | `heading-position` | Display a heading                                            | `"invert"`       | `undefined` |
| `headingUrl`      | `heading-url`      | Display a heading                                            | `string`         | `undefined` |
| `horizontal`      | `horizontal`       | Display menu items horizontally                              | `boolean`        | `undefined` |
| `list`            | --                 | Display a heading                                            | `PureMenuItem[]` | `undefined` |
| `scrollable`      | `scrollable`       | Add a scrollbar for overflowed menu content                  | `boolean`        | `undefined` |
